category.motivation: The article reports Ubisoft’s release of a free DLC for Assassin’s Creed Mirage, a partnership with Savvy Games Group, and Microsoft adding the game to Game Pass—company news not related to earnings.

impact.motivation: The article announces a major content update for Assassin’s Creed Mirage, adding new story chapters and missions, which directly affects the game’s content and player experience.

time_frame.motivation: The article focuses on the upcoming release of a free DLC for Assassin’s Creed Mirage and its immediate availability later this year.

article_node.title: Assassin's Creed Mirage will get fresh content later this year and it'll be completely free
article_node.summary: Ubisoft announced a free DLC for Assassin’s Creed Mirage featuring a new story chapter and missions set in ninth‑century alUla, with gameplay improvements and a release slated for later this year. The DLC follows a partnership with Savvy Games Group and builds on Mirage’s focus on stealth and open‑world design. Microsoft added Mirage to its Game Pass lineup in August, and the article includes a review that praises the game’s return to classic Assassin’s Creed roots, concise length, and historical setting. Mirage is scheduled for release on October 12 across multiple platforms.
